String SectionName = 'contactobj';
String CS360objName = 'objName';
Delete[Select id from JBCXM__UIViews__c where name =: SectionName];



JBCXM__UIViews__c rList = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(JBCXM__BaseObject__c='Contact',
														  JBCXM__AccountReference__c='AccountId',
														  JBCXM__ColumnList__c='[{"name":"Account.Name","label":"Account ID Name","displayOrder":1,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Contact","fieldType":"TEXT","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":"0"},{"name":"FirstName","label":"First Name","displayOrder":2,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Contact","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":"0"},{"name":"Email","label":"Email","displayOrder":3,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Contact","fieldType":"EMAIL","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":"0"},{"name":"LastName","label":"Last Name","displayOrder":4,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"Contact","fieldType":"STRING","isGroupable":true,"hasJBCXMNS":false,"decimalPlaces":"0"}]',
														  JBCXM__Description__c	 = 'text',
														  JBCXM__IsRB__c= true,
														  JBCXM__IsShown__c	 = true,
														  JBCXM__IsStandard__c=false,
														  JBCXM__ReportParams__c='[]',
														  JBCXM__ShowDefault__c	=false,
														  JBCXM__UITabName__c='Contact',
														  Name = SectionName,
														  JBCXM__Visibility__c='Public',
														  JBCXM__VisualType__c='List');
insert rList;
